snippet: Friends or relatives in the last third of their lives may have advice that may improve your own chances of living successfully.
abstract: Examples of questions that are effective in drawing valuable advice from elders, in light of book 30 Lessons for Living by Karl Pillemer.
lead_paragraph: Friends or relatives in the last third of their lives may have advice that may improve your own chances of living successfully.

headline.seo: 10 Things to Ask When Seeking Life Lessons
headline.main: Questions for Your Own Circle of Experts
headline.print_headline: Questions for Your Own Circle of Experts
